definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: A lot of customers have approached us to enquire for mohair sweaters.
sentences.chinese: 許多客戶向我們詢購馬海毛毛衣。

sentences.english: In this paper, the mohair fiber is processed by plasma.
sentences.chinese: 文章利用等離子體對馬海毛纖維進行處理。

sentences.english: America's top producing state is Texas.
sentences.chinese: 美國生產馬海毛最頂尖的州是德克薩斯州。
